revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Spawn}} '''A_FiredSplotch'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawns {{Class|FireDemonSplotch1}} and {{Class|FireDemonSplotch2}} actors at the location of the caller. Both actors have their x/y velocities set to some values -4-4. The Z velocities are set to some values 3-7. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FireDemon}} and derived classes.
